Class NewsHandler

  • public class NewsHandler
extends Handler

      • getNews

        public java.util.List<News> getNews(boolean limit)
        Tries to retrieve a list of news. If limit == true, the limit is set to 6 news - for the frontpage. If limit == false, there is no limit - for the news edit form.
        Parameters:
        limit -
        Returns:
        List
